attributes.action: ensure that all levels of Government seek to treat the dead with the respect they deserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that both national and local government is not putting sufficient resources into services relating to the deceased. This includes services such as social fund payments from the DWP and local crematorium and coroners services. We feel this is wrong and would urge the prime minister to ensure that an adequate level of resources is put into services for the bereaved so that the dead are given the respect they deserve.
